title: Collaborative Simulation-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Process

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Math problem-solving activities in smartphone-based VR simulation environments, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments. Intentionally designed to emphasize collaborative interaction among learners

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems through collaborative activities in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can propose at least three creative problem-solving strategies through peer interaction.
Learners can explain mathematical insights gained from the collaborative learning process through project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
